import React from "react"; const Teacher = () => { // Submit PPIC / ADD const SubmitPPIC = (event) => { if (!Model || !Pnc || !Week || !date || !Stock) { alert("Harap isi semua kolom!"); return; } const data = { Model: Model, Pnc: Pnc, Week: Week, Stock: Stock, Wip: Wip, date: date, SE: SE, QC: QC, }; fetch(`http://192.168.101.236:3001/api/post/Week3`, { method: "POST", headers: { "Content-Type": "application/json", }, body: JSON.stringify(data), }) .then((response) => { if (response.status === 200) { alert("Data Berhasil Di Input"); setIsModelW2(false); window.location.reload(); event.preventDefault(); } else { throw new Error("Error adding data"); } }) .catch((err) => { console.log(err); }); }; return (
